text.div: This profile constrains the ClaimResponse resource to serve as the RTPBC Response in the consumer real-time pharmacy benefit check process. It uses the ClaimResponse's "predetermination" processing mode

name: CarinRtpbcResponse
title: CARIN RTPBC Response using ClaimResponse
description: This profile constrains the ClaimResponse resource to serve as the RTPBC Response in the consumer real-time pharmacy benefit check process. It uses the ClaimResponse's "predetermination" processing mode

element.label: Unique ClaimResponse Resource Identifier
element.definition: Unique ClaimResponse Resource Identifier assigned by the responding payer/PBM

element.label: Response status
element.definition: The status of this response (active)

element.label: Requested Service Type
element.definition: The type of service for which pricing and coverage predetermination is being requested

element.label: Processing Mode
element.definition: The mode of processing being performed by the payer/PBM

element.label: Response Patient Information
element.definition: Limited patient information required in the consumer real-time pharmacy benefit check (RTPBC) process
element.comment: Echo the Patient resource received in the request

element.label: Submitter's RTPBC Request ID
element.definition: The RTPBC Request ID contained in the associated request

element.label: Processing Outcome
element.definition:
The outcome of processing. Either 'complete' (finished without errors) or 'error' (processing could not complete). The outcome is 'processed' if processing completes with a coverage determination, including when it is determined that the requested product is not covered. Otherwise, the outcome = 'error'. 

**Note: If a system or communication error occurs, an OperationOutcome is returned instead of a ClaimResponse**
element.comment: If the outcome = 'error', the .error composite must be populated.

element.label: Completed Note
element.definition: Note providing clarifying information and/or support contact information. Available for both 'completed' and 'error' outcomes.
element.comment: The responding payer/PBM determines when and how to populate.Recommended that a patient help desk phone number be included.
element.requirements: Corresponds to the Help Desk Support elements in the NCPDP RTPBC response message.

element.label: Requested Product and Pharmacy
element.definition: Composite containing cost and coverage for the requested product and pharmacy.

element.label: Associated request Item Sequence
element.definition: Indicates that the information in this .item composite is an alternative to the requested product and pharmacy.
element.comment: Because a maximum of one product is submitted per request, this value is always '1'.

element.label: Priced Pharmacy
element.definition: Reference to an Organization resource representing the priced pharmacy

element.label: Product
element.definition: A product identifier for the medication. Either an NDC11 or an RxNorm code for a prescribable product (representing drug name, strength and dose form)

binding.description: CARIN RTPBC prescribable product codes (NDC and RxNorm)

element.label: Quantity in Billing Units
element.definition: The prescribed quantity in terms of the applicable billing unit of measure.

element.label: Billing unit of measure
element.definition: Pharmacy metric billing unit: GM (gram), ML (milliliter) or EA (each)

element.label: Product Description
element.definition: The full prescribable product name, including drug name, strength and dose form. The drug name equals the brand name if the branded product is desired.

element.label: Determination Note Number
element.definition: Number referencing a Determination Note (.processNote) explaining the coverage status for this product + pharmacy combination.

element.label: Alternative Product and Pharmacy Determination
element.definition: Patient cost and coverage details for an alternative product and pharmacy combination.

element.label: Patient Pay Component
element.definition: Identifies a component of the patient's financial responsibility for the product cost.
element.comment: At least one .adjudication must contain a .category with the .code value 'total', representing the patient's total financial responsibility for the product
element.requirements: Corresponds to NCPDP C95-KQ Patient Pay Component Qualifier.

element.label: Patient Pay Component Amount
element.definition: The amount associated with the Patient Pay Component (.adjudication.category).

element.label: Patient Pay Amount Value
element.definition: The patient pay component amount in terms of the specified currency.

element.label: Determination Note
element.definition: Coverage determination for a product / pharmacy combination, in human-readable form. E.g., 'Covered', 'Covered with restriction: PA required', 'Not covered'

element.label: Pharmacy Coverage Reference
element.definition: Reference to a Coverage resource containing identification of the patient's pharmacy coverage.

element.label: Determination Note Number
element.comment: Links to the .noteNumber elements in .item and .addItem

element.definition: Indicates that the information in this .item composite relates to the requested product and pharmacy.

element.label: Determination Note Number
element.definition: Number referencing a Determination Note (.processNote) explaining the coverage status for this product + pharmacy combination.

element.label: Requested Product and Pharmacy Determination
element.definition: Patient cost and coverage details for the requested product and pharmacy.

element.label: Patient Pay Component
element.definition: Identifies a component of the patient's financial responsibility for the product cost.
element.comment: At least one .adjudication must contain a .category with the .code value 'total', representing the patient's total financial responsibility for the product
element.requirements: Corresponds to NCPDP C95-KQ Patient Pay Component Qualifier.

element.label: Patient Pay Component Amount
element.definition: The amount associated with the Patient Pay Component (.adjudication.category).

element.label: Patient Pay Amount Value
element.definition: The patient pay component amount in terms of the specified currency.

element.label: Reject Reason
element.definition: A code identifying the reason that processing could not be completed.

binding.description: RTPBC Reject Codes (to be determined. Correspond to NCPDP 511-FB)

element.label: Reject Message
element.definition: Clarification of the reject cause.

element.label: RTPBC Request ID
element.definition: The RTPBC Request ID contained in the associated request
element.comment: Populate with the Claim.identifier.value from the associated request

element.label: Unique RTPBC response ID
element.definition: An identifier for each RTPBC response that is assigned by and unique to the reponder
